attributes.review: I got the app and my phone no longer works and all my accounts are hacked! I hate this app it’s horrible do not install. I’m not even voting for trump because this app stole my bank account info! It has horrible information too! I hate it so much! Horrible! Bad! No! Anyway stan Nicki for clear skin 😝💅
attributes.title: AWFUL

attributes.review: So I downloaded this app and saw my worst nightmare. I have coulrophobia which for people without Google or internet is a fear of clowns😱 I was soo terrified that I fell out of my bed and broke 200 bones. I’m currently typing this with my pinky toe and tongue. This was just horrible I am scared for life now. So thank you for the medical bills and nightmares.
attributes.title: Why

attributes.review: After downloading the app, my phone started to crash. When I tried deleting it, it erased my phones memory as well as deleting all my apps and erasing my profiles. It even drained the money from my bank account. Please for the love of god don’t download this.
attributes.title: Ruined my life

attributes.review: As soon as I opened up the app It immediately froze my phone. I could tap anything or even turn off my phone. This experience combined with the fact that it’s basically a ploy for Trump to get votes is the reason why no one should download it.
attributes.title: Absolutely Awful

attributes.review: I got this app because i thought it would be decent, but not too long after I saw Trumps nudes. Like. He aint even got a shrimp dick, i had to bust out my microscope. I am now legally blind and have trauma. The image is burned into my head. My pet caterpillar also died when he saw this app. Horrible. Im now also im mourning. 😿😿😿😿 👺
attributes.title: Awful app 😾😾

attributes.review: When I opened the app up it wanted to scan my face and when it did it said I was Mexican and I shouldn’t be on it and started to glitch all off my stuff sooooo I had to buy a new phone cuz my old one would NOT stop glitching ever since I got it soo I do not recommend this app🙃🤚🏻
attributes.title: Review

attributes.review: This app is the worst app I’ve downloaded in a while ( Lets be honest, my whole life.) I am completely disgusted by the lack of freedom on this app. I am a FREE American, why can’t I just use the app without putting in my phone number? MY NUMBER , MY CHOICE. What a disgrace. Give me back my rights.  Never again!
attributes.title: The absolute worst

attributes.review: i opened this app and it immediately had glitches!! like what?? with all of that money and this is what he could do? this app is absolute GARBAGE!! do not recommend it at all to anyone. if it were up to me i would remove this app from the app store for many different community violations.
attributes.title: WORST APP!!

attributes.review: As soon as I opened the app it crashed and I kept going in but it kept crashing then all of the sudden it told me to go back to Africa. Then the man himself proceeded to call me and say if you don’t stop I’ll you arrested and the rest of your family deported sooo. 1 star. If I could give it zero stars I would
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER

attributes.review: They tracked me were ever I will go and it got scary when I turned the tracker off it turned it back on do not install worst app out there. They got my money from my credit card and made me do stuff I didn’t want !! Don’t get it it’s hard to delete
attributes.title: The track you
